events.desc: John goes to a tech conference in Toronto
Mary organizes a tech conference in Toronto
John meets Mary in Toronto while at a tech conference
John and Mary go on a date in Toronto
John returns to Seattle after his conference
Adam moves to Seattle
Adam meets John in a Seattle coffee shop and decide to start a business together
John and Adam recruit Mary to their business in Seattle
John and Adam recruit Don, an intern, to their Seattle business
Mary suggests John and Adam to interview Tracy
John and Adam fly to Toronto to meet Tracy
Mary sets up the office in Seattle with Don
John and Adam return to Seattle with Tracy
John and Mary go to San Francisco to meet investors
Adam and Tracy start meeting clients together in Seattle
John and Mary goes to the pier in San Francisco for a date
John and Mary goes to the park in San Francisco for a date
John and Mary return to Seattle
John and Adam move in together in Seattle
Tracy and Don move in together in Seattle
Adam joins a book club in Seattle
Tracy and Mary fly back to Toronto to see family
An illness in the family forces Mary to stay in Toronto
Tracy stays with Mary in Toronto for moral support
Adam promotes Don to fill in the gap left by Mary's absence
John rushes to finish his work for the month in hopes of visiting Mary
Adam and Don find a great Korean restaurant near their workplace
Tracy spends her last day in Toronto with Mary
Tracy returns to work in Seattle
John finishes his month's worth of work with Adam's help
John flies out to Toronto to support Mary
